message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $150. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer! I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking it's worth a bit more. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $135. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
Hi Bob, I understand you're still a bit short on budget, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell it to you for $130. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $130, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
